messages.subject: Re: Fwd: Unschooling and Reading
messages.msgSnippet: ... -=-***Hmm. So what do you recommend? Perhaps child-led learning or interest-led learning? Does that sound more appropriate?-=- How about kind of
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
-=-***Hmm. So what do you recommend? Perhaps child-led learning or
interest-led learning? Does that sound more appropriate?-=-

How about "kind of unschooled" or "sometimes unschooled"? Your
website isn't about unschooling. What I saw said you used a
combination of traditional stuff and unschooling. (It's not a
quote,
and I'm not going back to get a quote.)
Sandra

***Well heck, we're back to where we started then. :) That's why my
original post to Joyce said I homeschooled/unschooled. Otherwise I
would have just said unschooled. I think when I talk to others I
sometimes say something like 'I basically unschooled.' I don't remember
ever saying my site was about unschooling.

Debbie




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
